title: 2028 Summer Olympics
summary: The 2028 Summer Olympics (officially the Games of the XXXIV Olympiad, also known as Los Angeles 2028 and stylized as LA28) is a forthcoming international multi-sport event scheduled to take place from July 21 to August 6, 2028, in Los Angeles, California, United States. It will be the first Summer Games to be held in the US since the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta, Georgia, and the first Olympics in the US since the 2002 Winter Olympics in Salt Lake City, Utah.
